protein.specific_function: Tyrosine kinase of the non-receptor type, involved in the interleukin-2 and interleukin-4 signaling pathway. Phosphorylates STAT6, IRS1, IRS2 and PI3K

go_class.description: non-membrane spanning protein tyrosine kinase activity
